Articles.Content:
Hi everyone, does anyone know how to remove the on-screen messages that are displayed under the altimeter (top middle) of the screen?  I have been searching for awhile and can't find out.  They are always on in both the flight and map view.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hqo2fm1fivffaid/screenshot_2019-02-20--10-11-15.png?dl=0

2 hours ago, HawkEngineer said:

Hi everyone, does anyone know how to remove the on-screen messages that are displayed under the altimeter (top middle) of the screen?  I have been searching for awhile and can't find out.  They are always on in both the flight and map view.

https://www.dropbox.com/s/hqo2fm1fivffaid/screenshot_2019-02-20--10-11-15.png?dl=0

 

Looks like that info's coming from some mod.  So you'll need to figure out what mod it is, then figure out whether it has a setting that allows turning off the display (or, if there's no such setting, uninstall the mod.)

Sorry, no clue how to help you beyond that, since whatever mod you're using, it's not one I've ever used.
